subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Al Montoya, who played in more games in February than he did in the first six years of his N.H.L. career, is 3-2-1 entering Wednesday’s game against Minnesota.
snippet: Al Montoya, who played in more games in February than he did in the first six years of his N.H.L. career, is 3-2-1 entering Wednesday’s game against Minnesota.
